Posts.Content: May 15, 2013 11:56PM Sweetie1972 wrote: Love your poems Cindy! Your first poem I could really relate to. I had my first mammogram on February 8,13 only because I turned 40. The tech comes in to get me in waiting room says we need to do a ultrasound. After that we need to do biopsies all done in the same day.I was completely blown away. Then 4 days later the dredded call I'm sorry but you have cancer!
Posts.Title: "its not good news" littlebird75 badger
Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
